p: Comparison of the five databases, employing the data element model as a check-list, showed a fragmented and inconsistent distribution of DS representation with variability in data elements distribution and as well as in the underlying content ( Table 3), e.g., mechanism of action (only present in NM monographs), scientific name referring to Latin names (NM), or adverse reactions (NHPID, LNHPD) and adverse effects (NM) being used interchangeably.
